item.description:
***Cultural Cafe is taking a break in June because we're hosting an related event that we hope will become a fun and festive annual tradition. Please bring your friends along to support our great cause - and have fun while doing so!***

What: TASTE of the World brings Boston's finest international restaurants together for a festive evening of culinary sampling and networking, complete with a food-themed silent auction.

Proceeds will benefit Hostelling International USA's Cultural Kitchen program, where inner-city students learn about culture and conflict-resolution through cooking.

Who: Sample the wares of some of greater Boston's favorite international eateries, including:

* The Burren
* Danish Pastry House
* Estragon Tapas Bar
* Jacob Wirth
* Mela Indian Cuisine
* The Rattlesnake Bar and Grill
* Vlora
* Lucky's Lounge
* Taranta
* Irie Jamaican Style Restaurant
* Trattoria Toscana
* Istanbul'lu

The food-themed Taste of the World silent auction already includes exciting prizes from:

* Café Brazil
* Dave's Fresh Pasta
* The Elephant Walk
* Kickass Cupcakes
* Union Oyster House
* Henrietta's Table
* Edible Boston magazine
* Atlas Farm
* Cabot Cheese
* The Fireplace
* Taza Chocolate
* East Coast Grill
* Beacon Hill Chocolates
* Cambridge School of Culinary Arts
* Cambridge-based glass artisan Anthony Davlin
...and more!!

When: Thursday, June 10, 2010, 6 - 8 pm

Where: the City Year building, 287 Columbus Avenue in the Back Bay

Why: Just as our Cultural Kitchen program brings urban youth together through food, Taste of the World is a great way to meet fellow food-loving Bostonians while supporting a great program!

Tickets are $60 and include an evening of international tastes, live music, a food-lover's silent auction, and two complimentary drink tickets.

Tickets may be purchased:
Online: http://tasteoftheworl...
By phone: contact Karin at 617-718-7990 ext 23
By mail: 218 Holland Street, Somerville, MA 02144
(Checks made out to Hostelling International USA)

group.name: Cultural Café - Dine Out for a Cause

item.name: Taste of the World - bringing the world together through food
